definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: His love is not conditioned by your response.
sentences.chinese: 不管你做何反应，他的爱总是无条件的。

sentences.english: All the crew must submit to the shipmaster's aforementioned decisions unconditionally.
sentences.chinese: 所有船员必须无条件地服从船长做出的上述决定。
不对，他崇拜你，无条件地。

sentences.english: Many schools, of course, allow same-sex dates with no questions asked.
sentences.chinese: 许多学校当然无条件地允许同性恋聚会。

sentences.english: Exactly. Unconditional love! But it's so easy to get attached to an ani.
sentences.chinese: 有一点我的确是可以理解，动物给人的爱是无条件的。

sentences.english: Children always surprise us with their unconditional love.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子那种无条件的爱，常令我们惊喜。

sentences.english: Thanks to him I know what it means to be sensitive and love unconditionally.
sentences.chinese: 因为他，我才知道体贴和无条件的爱意味着什么。

sentences.english: Animals live in the present moment and they show love unconditionally.
sentences.chinese: 动物们都活在当下，并且无条件的表现出对生活的爱。

sentences.english: We also insisted on the unconditional release of the abducted Israeli soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 我们还坚持无条件释放被绑架的以色列士兵。

sentences.english: The auditors recommend that the certificate should be issued without further action.
sentences.chinese: 审核员建议无条件颁发认证书。

sentences.english: Japan should immediately let the Chinese captain return unconditionally.
sentences.chinese: 日方应立即无条件放回中方船长。

sentences.english: We need a space of unconditional acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个无条件接受自我的地方。
提及不可度量的，他们意指无条件的，绝对的。

sentences.english: Aindra, I bow down to you praying for your unconditional vaisnava grace.
sentences.chinese: 阿因卓，我向你顶拜祈求你无条件的外士那瓦的仁慈。

definition: variant of 給予|给予[ji3 yu3]
to promise/to undertake to do something/commitment
delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do
to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
to be in favor of/to support/to back/support/backing/to stand by/CL:個|个[ge4]
